title: 36 Hours in Oslo
abstract: The Norwegian capital is filled with art and stunning architecture, but nature, too, is an integral part of urban life.

multimedia.caption: The Akerselva River on an early autumn day.

title: In Boulder, Colo., Back to Nature at Very High Altitudes
abstract: The city can be pricey, but there are exceptional hiking and outdoor activities, and some of the finest national parks in the country not far away.

multimedia.caption: Rocky Mountain National Park has 415 square miles of protected terrain.
multimedia.copyright: Christina Kiffney for The New York Times

title: For Savannah Guthrie, Family Comes First
abstract: The “Today” co-anchor tries to bring her two children with her as often as possible when traveling, even if it sometimes means giving in to “Pirate Rules.”

multimedia.caption: Savannah Guthrie and her children, Vale and Charley Feldman, on a stroll in Manhattan in 2017.
multimedia.copyright: Hilary Swift for The New York Times
